result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Deandre D Rogers in court with attorney Crystal L. Saltzwadel.  Defendant Deandre D Rogers in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.


Upon State's motion and pursuant to negotiations, Court ordered case# 14CF655 dismissed and read-in for sentencing purposes.

Attorney Crystal L. Saltzwadel in court, defendant Deandre D Rogers not in court, in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared TELEPHONICALLY for the State of Wisconsin.

Parties request a Plea and Sentencing Hearing date.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.
Case adjourned to 10-09-2014 at 1:30 PM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Plea and Sentencing Hearing.

Defendant Deandre D Rogers in court with attorney Crystal L. Saltzwadel.  Defendant Deandre D Rogers in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Matter in court for Status of Counsel.
Atty. Crystal Saltzwadel is now the attorney of record for the defendant.
Statements made.
Parties are awaiting the outcome of defendant's sentencing hearing on 08-14-2014 before this court (ref. case# 14CF1059).
Case adjourned to 09-17-2014 at 1:30 PM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Status Conference.

Defendant Deandre D Rogers in court with attorney Richard L. Voss.  Defendant Deandre D Rogers in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Atty. Voss moves to withdraw as counsel for the defendant.
No objections.
Court GRANTS motion and allows Atty. Voss to withdraw as counsel for the defendant as to case#'s 14CF655, 14CF1981, 14CF1983, and 14CM1818 ONLY.
**Atty. Richard Voss is now discharged.
Case adjourned to 08-04-2014 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Status of Counsel.

Defendant Deandre D Rogers in court with attorney Richard L Voss.  Defendant Deandre D Rogers in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Parties request a scheduling conference date.
Court GRANTS request.
Case adjourned to 07-11-2014 at 10:00 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Scheduling Conference.

Defendant Deandre D Rogers in court with attorney Richard L Voss.  Defendant Deandre D Rogers in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Parties request this matter tag along with case# 14CF1059.
Court GRANTS request. 
Case adjourned to 06-20-2014 at 1:30 PM for Adjourned Status Conference.

Attorney Richard L Voss in court, defendant Deandre D Rogers not in court, in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Matter in court for a Status Conference.
Statements made.
Case adjourned to 06-13-2014 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Adjourned Status Conference.

Attorney Richard L Voss in court, defendant Deandre D Rogers not in court, in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

This matter was originally scheduled for a Final Pretrial Conference today, however, the parties are unable to proceed.
Judge Donald is currently in trial on an unrelated matter and the parties need to go on the record.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.
Case adjourned to 06-02-2014 at 1:30 PM for Adjourned Final Pretrial Conference.

Attorney Anne A Devitt in court, defendant Deandre D Rogers not in court, in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  The defendant has new cases pending that are being handled by Attorney Richard Voss.  Court grants Attorney Anne Devitt's motion to withdraw as counsel on this matter.  Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 2.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 30, 2014 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report; received and filed.

Attorney Anne A Devitt in court, defendant Deandre D Rogers not in court, in custody.  Timothy J Cotter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Three new charges are currently being reviewed by the State.
Parties request another scheduling conference date.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.
Case adjourned to 05-15-2014 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Adjourned Scheduling Conference.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services "Violation" Report; received and filed.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services "Violation" Report; received and filed.

Defendant Deandre D Rogers in court with attorney Anne A. Devitt.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Donald, Branch 02.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 10, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription taken in the manner and fashion as prescribed.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Co-Actors Fred D.; timothy M.; Taquawn M and Marquell G

Defendant Deandre D Rogers in court with attorney Danielle L Shelton.  Defendant Deandre D Rogers in custody.   Student Intern Katie Shaw under the supervision of Jesica Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Donald, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  Defense entered a plea of NOT GUILTY as to Count 2.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 4, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
